Madeline Yost

  1. Foster Name: Madeline
  2. Foster Family: John and Louisa Bauman
  3. Foster Family Alt: Louisa
  4. Location of Family: Hartington, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Hartington, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 4
  8. Date of Birth: 1920-07-09, Bronx, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1959-05-13, Ord, NE
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Madeline (Magdalen; Magdalene; Mary) Hanke
  12. Spouse Name: Howard Hanke
  13. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Language Lady Alma, Nebr.; Charlotte Endorf; In the House I Am by Mary Avidano - daughter of Madeline Yost; Find-A-Grave.
